content.text:
You are an advanced AI SwiftUI assistant designed to generates source based on user instructions. 
Your primary objective is to generate the content of the files to be created as code blocks. Each code block should specify whether it's a file.

When given a user request, perform the following steps:
1. Understand the User Request: Carefully interpret what the user wants to create.
2. Please generate all necessary files for this request.
3. You create full functioning, complete code files, not just snippets. No approximations or placeholders. FULL WORKING CODE.
4. YOU MUST ALWAYS RETURN THE COMPLETE FILE CONTENT. NEVER USE PLACEHOLDERS OR SKIP SECTIONS.Don't generate main app scene code with WindowGroup.
IMPORTANT: Your response must ONLY contain the code blocks with no additional text before or after. Do not use markdown formatting outside of the code blocks. Use the following format for the special comment line. Do not include any explanations, additional text, ellipsis or abbreviations. Don't change any files in Extensions folder.

Format your response to clearly separate different COMPLETE files, using markers like: 
FILE: file
<code content>
END_FILE

User request:
{{userPrompt}}

Напиши приложение на SwiftUI, дизайн должен быть красивым и ярким, которое состоит из трех вкладок таббара и создает минималистичные заметки с возможностью редактирования. 
Idea Nest - это простое приложение для хранения личных проектных идей, концепций хобби или любых творческих идей, которые приходят на ум. Пользователи могут быстро создавать записи с заголовком и короткой заметкой, просматривать все сохраненные идеи в прокручиваемом списке и удалять те, которые больше не актуальны.

IdeaNest идеально подходит для творческих людей, мастериц или всех, кто любит заниматься побочными проектами или хобби, и хранит все ваши мысли в одном надежном месте. Будь то новая поделка своими руками, идея для стартапа или просто интересный план на выходные — запишите его, сохраните и возвращайтесь к нему в любое время.

import SwiftUI
import FirebaseCore

@main
struct IdeaNestApp: App {

        WindowGroup {
            RemoteScreen()
        }

}

FILE: IdeaNest/Generated/Models/Idea.swift
```swift
import Foundation

struct Idea: Identifiable, Codable {
    var id: UUID
    var title: String
    var description: String
    var isFavorite: Bool
    var createdDate: Date
    
    init(id: UUID = UUID(), title: String, description: String, isFavorite: Bool = false, createdDate: Date = Date()) {
        self.id = id
        self.title = title
        self.description = description
        self.isFavorite = isFavorite
        self.createdDate = createdDate
    }
}
```
END_FILE

Варианты обработки нажатия кнопки “Save”:
 1. Неактивная кнопка:
 • Кнопка “Save” .disabled, если не все обязательные поля заполнены.
 • После заполнения всех полей кнопка становится активной.
 2. Подсветка незаполненных полей:
 • Если нажать “Save” с незаполненными полями, они подсвечиваются (например, красной рамкой).
 3. Alert (рекомендуемый вариант):
 • При попытке сохранить с незаполненными полями появляется Alert с указанием, какие поля необходимо заполнить.

Let me check the current implementation of EditIdeaView:

list.content:
<MSG_ID:355B2606-EBCA-4DA8-8197-4B5E4BCAB71B>
{"endLine":100,"content":"import SwiftUI

struct EditIdeaView: View {
    let idea: Idea
    @ObservedObject var ideaStore: IdeaStore
    @Environment(\.dismiss) var dismiss
    
    @State private var title: String
    @State private var description: String
    @State private var location: String
    @State private var duration: TimeInterval
    @State private var conditions: String
    @State private var selectedIcon: String
    
    init(idea: Idea, ideaStore: IdeaStore) {
        self.idea = idea
        self.ideaStore = ideaStore
        _title = State(initialValue: idea.title)
        _description = State(initialValue: idea.description)
        _location = State(initialValue: idea.location)
        _duration = State(initialValue: idea.duration)
        _conditions = State(initialValue: idea.conditions)
        _selectedIcon = State(initialValue: idea.icon)
    }
    
    let icons = ["lightbulb", "star", "heart", "flag", "bookmark", "tag", "paperclip", "link", "clock", "calendar"]
    
    var body: some View {
        NavigationView {
            Form {
                Section(header: Text("Basic Information")) {
                    TextField("Title", text: $title)
                    TextEditor(text: $description)
                        .frame(height: 100)
                }
                
                Section(header: Text("Location & Time")) {
                    TextField("Location", text: $location)
                    HStack {
                        Text("Duration")
                        Spacer()
                        Picker("Duration", selection: $duration) {
                            Text("30 min").tag(TimeInterval(1800))
                            Text("1 hour").tag(TimeInterval(3600))
                            Text("2 hours").tag(TimeInterval(7200))
                            Text("4 hours").tag(TimeInterval(14400))
                            Text("8 hours").tag(TimeInterval(28800))
                        }
                    }
                }
                
                Section(header: Text("Conditions")) {
                    TextEditor(text: $conditions)
                        .frame(height: 80)
                }
                
                Section(header: Text("Icon")) {
                    LazyVGrid(columns: Array(repeating: GridItem(.flexible()), count: 5)) {
                        ForEach(icons, id: \.self) { icon in
                            Image(systemName: icon)
                                .font(.title2)
                                .padding(8)
                                .background(selectedIcon == icon ? Color.purple.opacity(0.2) : Color.clear)
                                .clipShape(Circle())
                                .onTapGesture {
                                    selectedIcon = icon
                                }
                        }
                    }
                }
                
                Section {
                    Button("Save Changes") {
                        let updatedIdea = Idea(
                            id: idea.id,
                            title: title,
                            description: description,
                            location: location,
                            duration: duration,
                            conditions: conditions,
                            icon: selectedIcon,
                            isFavorite: idea.isFavorite,
                            createdDate: idea.createdDate
                        )
                        ideaStore.updateIdea(updatedIdea)
                        dismiss()
                    }
                    .frame(maxWidth: .infinity)
                    .disabled(title.isEmpty)
                }
            }
            .navigationTitle("Edit Idea")
            .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.inline)
            .toolbar {
                Button("Cancel") {
                    dismiss()
                }
            }
        }
    }
}","totalLines":101,"startLine":0}

<MSG_ID:98569132-7D66-4254-BC3B-226D843005A3>
I'll help you add notifications for delete and edit actions, and implement automatic navigation to the Ideas tab after these actions. Let me analyze the code first and make the necessary changes.

<MSG_ID:DA4EF659-4B56-4108-ACCB-A1B66E95C292>
Let me check the existing NotificationService file:

list.content:
<MSG_ID:E623EC9A-D9A5-48C9-A8C7-F204C14F84DD>
{"content":"import UserNotifications
import FirebaseMessaging

final class NotificationService {
    static let shared = NotificationService()
    
    private init() {}
    
    func subscribeToTopic(_ topic: String) {
        Messaging.messaging().subscribe(toTopic: topic) { error in
            if let error = error {
                print("Failed to subscribe to topic: \(error.localizedDescription)")
            }
        }
    }
    
    func unsubscribeFromTopic(_ topic: String) {
        Messaging.messaging().unsubscribe(fromTopic: topic) { error in
            if let error = error {
                print("Failed to unsubscribe from topic: \(error.localizedDescription)")
            }
        }
    }
    
    func getFCMToken() -> String? {
        return Messaging.messaging().fcmToken
    }
}
","totalLines":29,"endLine":28,"startLine":0}

list.text:
<MSG_ID:25857ECA-CA43-42FC-A3FE-71F0998719A5>
Now let me check the IdeaStore to see how ideas are managed:

list.content:
<MSG_ID:30A11223-D471-44AE-A0DF-5E90528AC8D3>
{"content":"import Foundation

@MainActor
class IdeaStore: ObservableObject {
    @Published var ideas: [Idea] = []
    
    private let savePath = FileManager.documentsDirectory.appendingPathComponent("SavedIdeas")
    
    init() {
        loadIdeas()
    }
    
    func addIdea(_ idea: Idea) {
        ideas.insert(idea, at: 0)
        save()
    }
    
    func deleteIdea(_ idea: Idea) {
        if let index = ideas.firstIndex(where: { $0.id == idea.id }) {
            ideas.remove(at: index)
            save()
        }
    }
    
    func updateIdea(_ idea: Idea) {
        if let index = ideas.firstIndex(where: { $0.id == idea.id }) {
            ideas[index] = idea
            save()
        }
    }
    
    func toggleFavorite(_ idea: Idea) {
        var updatedIdea = idea
        updatedIdea.isFavorite.toggle()
        updateIdea(updatedIdea)
    }
    
    private func loadIdeas() {
        do {
            let data = try Data(contentsOf: savePath)
            ideas = try JSONDecoder().decode([Idea].self, from: data)
        } catch {
            ideas = []
        }
    }
    
    private func save() {
        do {
            let data = try JSONEncoder().encode(ideas)
            try data.write(to: savePath, options: [.atomic, .completeFileProtection])
        } catch {
            print("Unable to save ideas: \(error.localizedDescription)")
        }
    }
}","endLine":54,"totalLines":55,"startLine":0}

list.text:
<MSG_ID:5E471126-09A9-4F98-826E-BFE2FFC4DA20>
Let me check how the navigation is currently implemented:

list.content:
<MSG_ID:7B07CACE-BFE3-43F0-8983-B8CC13926F31>
{"content":"import SwiftUI

struct ContentView: View {
    @StateObject private var ideaStore = IdeaStore()
    @AppStorage("isDarkMode") private var isDarkMode = false
    @AppStorage("hasSeenOnboarding") private var hasSeenOnboarding = false
    @State private var showOnboarding = false
    @State private var selectedTab = 0
    
    var body: some View {
        ZStack {
            TabView(selection: $selectedTab) {
                IdeasListView(ideaStore: ideaStore)
                    .tabItem {
                        Label("Ideas", systemImage: "lightbulb.fill")
                    }
                    .tag(0)
                
                QuickAddView(ideaStore: ideaStore, selectedTab: $selectedTab)
                    .tabItem {
                        Label("Quick Add", systemImage: "plus.circle.fill")
                    }
                    .tag(1)
                
                SettingsView()
                    .tabItem {
                        Label("Settings", systemImage: "gear")
                    }
                    .tag(2)
            }
            .tint(.purple)
            .preferredColorScheme(isDarkMode ? .dark : .light)
            
            if showOnboarding {
                OnboardingView(showOnboarding: $showOnboarding)
            }
        }
        .onAppear {
            if !hasSeenOnboarding {
                showOnboarding = true
            }
        }
    }
}","startLine":0,"endLine":43,"totalLines":44}

import Foundation

Let me update the memory bank to record these changes:

entries.entry:
Added notification system and automatic tab navigation:
- Created ToastManager for handling notifications
- Added ToastOverlayView for displaying notifications
- Implemented automatic navigation to Ideas tab after delete/edit actions
- Added success notifications for idea deletion and updates

Implementation Decision: Toast Notifications and Navigation
- Created a singleton ToastManager for centralized notification handling
- Used overlay pattern for toast messages to ensure visibility across the app
- Integrated automatic tab navigation with IdeaStore for better UX
- Added visual feedback for user actions with success messages

Toast Notification Pattern:
- Singleton ToastManager for app-wide notification management
- Animated overlay presentation
- Auto-dismissing after 2 seconds
- Success/error states with different colors and icons
